text.0: Do you know that our fact-checking platform, Dubawa @dubawaNG @dubawaGH @dubawa_official has a YouTube page? Instead of reading the latest factcheck, you can now watch it, here: https://t.co/AQh7edZAXI https://t.co/t6bTmCiKIO
